subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Nenad Zimonjic and Michaël Llodra team up for doubles at the Australian Open, after the Davis Cup final between Serbia and France reduced both these big hitters to tears on consecutive days.
snippet: Nenad Zimonjic and Michaël Llodra team up for doubles at the Australian Open, after the Davis Cup final between Serbia and France reduced both these big hitters to tears on consecutive days.
